text: Hagi Juda vahera ha' vahezmimo'za eme zamavare'za vu'za mopazmirega ome kina huzmante'neza, kazokazo eri'za zamiza zamazeri haviza hu'naze. Ana hazage'za Juda vahe'mo'za ru vahepi umani emani hu'neza, magore hu'za mani fru osu'naze. Ana nehu'za tusi knazampima mani'nageno'a, ha' vahe'mo'za zamarotago hu'za ome zamazeri havizantfa hu'naze.
